member.name: T:StatNeth.Blaise.API.Windows.Dialogs
member.summary: Dialogs API provides access to usefull help windows

member.name: M:StatNeth.Blaise.API.Windows.Dialogs.ShowFieldsSelectorDialog(System.Windows.Window,StatNeth.Blaise.API.DataInterface.IDataInterface,StatNeth.Blaise.API.Windows.Data.SelectedFields@)
member.summary: Show a modal Field Selector dialog
member.param: Window which owns the launched dialog
member.example: API.DataInterface.IDataInterface di = API.DataInterface.DataInterfaceManager.GetDataInterface(bdix); result = API.Windows.Dialogs.ShowFieldsSelectorDialog(this, di, ref selectedFields);
member.returns: if datamodel could not load: null, otherwise dialog result

member.name: M:StatNeth.Blaise.API.Windows.Dialogs.ShowFieldsSelectorDialog(System.Windows.Window,StatNeth.Blaise.API.Meta.IDatamodel,StatNeth.Blaise.API.Windows.Data.SelectedFields@)
member.summary: Show a modal Field Selector dialog
member.param: Window which owns the launched dialog
member.example: API.Meta.IDatamodel model = API.Meta.MetaManager.GetDatamodel(bmix); result = API.Windows.Dialogs.ShowFieldsSelectorDialog(this, model, ref selectedFields);
member.returns: if datamodel could not load: null, otherwise dialog result

member.name: M:StatNeth.Blaise.API.Windows.Dialogs.ShowFieldsSelectorDialog(System.Windows.Window,System.String,StatNeth.Blaise.API.Windows.Data.SelectedFields@)
member.summary: Show a modal Field Selector dialog
member.param: Window which owns the launched dialog
file name of a bdix or bmix datamodel specification
